message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my price reflects the true value of this product. I could meet you halfway at $17,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $15,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
